逮捕監禁罪: (たいほかんきんざい) - false arrest and imprisonment; illegal arrest and confinement

週七日: (しゅうなのか) - seven days a week

週三日: (しゅうみっか) - three days a week

週内: (しゅうない) - by the end of this week; within the week

週末起業: (しゅうまつきぎょう) - running a start-up company after work or on weekends
